short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveals the value of all password fields on the current page. Great for trying to remember what your password is.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Password Revealer will reveal the text behind the hidden password fields. This is great if you always forget what your password is and you can't remember what all those '*******' mean.
